snippet: One of the arts of bridge is finding bids and plays that make life harder for your opponents.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during Sectional Tournament at Cathy Kirshner's Bridgexpress club at Lake Success Jewish Center in Great Neck, NY.
lead_paragraph: One of the arts of bridge is finding bids and plays that make life harder for your opponents.
